Detailed Description

A source collection.

A source collection consists of an arbitrary number of any other sources with weights of and delivers particles from with probability . A source collection is defined using 

:start source:
    library = egs_source_collection
    name = some_name
    source names = list of names of previously defined sources
    weights = list of weights for the sources
:stop source:
